of July 25, 2023
ORD. CAL. NOS. 34,302 and 34,303 - BY: COUNCILMEMBERS GIARRUSSO,
3.
MORENO, GREEN AND THOMAS (BY REQUEST) - To Present: Norman White,
CFO City of New Orleans and Jason Akers of Foley & Judell, L.L.P. These ordinances
amend Ordinance Nos. 29265 M.C.S. and 29266 M.C.S ., as amended, entitled "An
Ordinance Providing an Operating Budget of Revenues and Expenditures for the City
of New Orleans for the Year 2023", to appropriate funds to the Department of Finance
for the outstanding Parity Bond Notes in series 2012, 2016 and 2017; and otherwise to
provide with respect thereto: Description: Transfer $34,070,000 from the Reserve Fund
(FUND 1182)/ Other Financing Sources use of the Fund Balance to the General Fund
(FUND 1000)/Department of Finance 600-Debt Service.
